ygData.subject: Someday (Romantic Song)
ygData.msgSnippet: This is my first stab at a serious song. This one is about a couple, a cleric and a wood elf, who actually met in game, and are now dating long distance in RL.
ygData.messageBody:
This is my first stab at a serious song. This one is about a couple, a cleric and a wood elf, who actually met in game, and are now dating long distance in RL.

- Reed


Someday,
We´┐¢ll be together.
Through stormy weather,
We will hold each other.
Until then,
I will be with you,
In the world we make true,
In our own imagination

You´┐¢re a nimble wood elf girl
From the tree´┐¢s of Kelethin
Your fairness is beyond compare,
More lovely though, your heart within.
A laugh from your will make me smile;
I´┐¢m at rest when you´┐¢re at play.
Many friends can bring good cheer,
But I´┐¢m alone when you´┐¢re away.

One way
Or another,
We will discover,
The joy of touching.
(Until then)
We´┐¢ll meet
In a world of beauty
A world of danger
A world we call our own.

You´┐¢re a healer through and through
Helping out ones in distress
You´┐¢ve healed my body many times.
You´┐¢ve healed my heart of loneliness
I wish upon the stars and moon
And on the paths that planets roam
Longing for the coming day
When children´┐¢s laughter fills our home.

Someday
We´┐¢ll be together
And we´┐¢ll remember
Our home away from home
